definition: (dialect) form of address for one's wife/polite form of address for a woman
mother/young lady/(coll.) effeminate
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
see 新娘[xin1 niang2]

sentences.english: Of course it's the bride's sister group.
sentences.chinese: 當然是新娘子的姐妹團嘍。

sentences.english: Babi Yar is a ravine in Kiev, the capital of Ukraine.
sentences.chinese: 娘子谷是烏克蘭首都基輔的一條溝壑。

sentences.english: In the beginning, the bride's parents opposed her mariage, but at end, we agreed to.
sentences.chinese: 最初新娘子的爸媽反對這樁婚事，但最終還得同意了。

sentences.english: Qionghua joins the Red Detachment, and is presented a rifle by her Company Officer.
sentences.chinese: 瓊花隨即加入娘子軍，並由連長授槍。

sentences.english: Allows female units to become invisible at night, but only while standing still.
sentences.chinese: 讓娘子軍在夜晚站立不動時隱形。

sentences.english: But she didn't have the white lady luck, only from the war.
sentences.chinese: 只是她沒有白娘子的幸運，只有離殤。

sentences.english: In the beginning, the bride's parents opposed her mariage, but at last, they agreed to.
sentences.chinese: 最初新娘子的父母反對這樁婚事，但最終還是同意了。

sentences.english: Music video by Iron Maiden performing Wasted Years.
sentences.chinese: 鐵娘子執行蹉跎歲月的音樂錄像。

sentences.english: Is Fahai in "The Legend of the White Snake" good or bad?
sentences.chinese: 戲說《新白娘子傳奇》中的法海，到底是好還是壞？

sentences.english: The Party Representative of the Detachment, Hong Changqing educates the soldiers and the people with the bitter experience of Qionghua's family.
sentences.chinese: 娘子軍黨代表洪常青以瓊花的世代怨仇教育廣大軍民。

sentences.english: Why brides wedding day by wearing clothes dresses don't have a bag then?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼新娘子結婚當天所穿的衣服禮服忌有袋口呢？

sentences.english: From then on, she added a "Goddess of Paper-Cutting" image in every piece of her works.
sentences.chinese: 從此在作品中，她都要剪一個“剪花娘子”的形象。

sentences.english: The Iron Lady, to a fault, seems to think that as well.
sentences.chinese: 鐵娘子似乎也這樣想，並想的有些過分。

sentences.english: Bride is often compared to half open blossom.
sentences.chinese: 新娘子通常被比作即將盛開的花朵。

sentences.english: Iron Maiden Cover Golden Earring Song.
If there was no Fahai, the White Snake's family would live happily together.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有他，白娘子一家會生活的很幸福很幸福。

definition: lord/master/young gentleman/male prostitute/catamite/mahjong player disqualified by unintentionally taking in the wrong number of dominoes/(old form of address for one's husband) husband
my husband and master (archaic)/playboy of rich family/pimp
older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
(old) your servant (humble self-reference by young female)
son-in-law (used by wife's family)/uncle (husband of father's sister)
woman (derog.)
son of an official/son of nobility/your son (honorific)
son of the boss/young master of the house/your son (honorific)
eldest daughter of an affluent family/(polite) your daughter/bossy or indulged young woman/Miss High and Mighty
girl/servant girl/(used deprecatingly, but sometimes also as a term of endearment)
landlord (old usage)
(respectful) lord/master/(coll.) maternal grandfather
wife
worthy little brother
boyfriend/paramour (of a woman)
see 二郎神[Er4 lang2 shen2]
